long_description: When your young adventurer faces a chilly, gray day, make sure he stays warm from the top down in the moisture-wicking, quick-drying Screamer Frontside hat. Acrylic knit exterior is soft and breathable; synthetic fleece lining wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep kids comfortable even when they warm up. Closeout.
short_description: When your young adventurer faces a chilly, gray day, make sure he stays warm from the top down in the moisture-wicking, quick-drying Screamer Frontside hat.
